name: Epy (rpgvideo)
description:
Epy, a funny creature lost in parallel universe, is looking for your help! Find the key to open the
portal and maybe Epy will find the way home!

Epy is a classic early 00s style puzzle game

Features
Steam Trading Cards
Colourful Graphics

System requirements

OS: Windows XP-7-10
Pentium 200 Ghz
10 MB Space HD
32 MB RAM
DirectX 9.0

Epy is created by Camagames and is published by RPGVideo and will be priced at $1

[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/b5h5vs.png[/IMG]
www.rpgstudios.co.uk
